title: Cell execution fails with undefined variable error
body: When I run cells in a notebook, sometimes I get 'NameError: name X is not defined' even though the variable was defined in a previous cell. This happens randomly and is very frustrating for data analysis workflows.

comments.body: This might be related to kernel state management. Try restarting the kernel.
Restarting helps temporarily but the issue comes back after a few cell executions.
Fixed by implementing better kernel state management. Variable scope is now properly maintained.

subject: notebook_execution
